_sText:
MG MARIO KART RAINBOW ROAD


Hi all.

I thought I would have a crack at an all time favorite map from Mario Kart.

It is by no means a replica of the original as the vertex manipulation on this one was hard enough on this one, but it is the same theme and song (see video).

Anyway, as always, constructive feedback is appreciated.

Cheers

EDIT


As requested, I have included 3 levels of difficulty.

**Beginner - **Track is completely walled (safe).

**Intermediate -** Most of the walls are removed except for difficulty turns (the spiral turns).

**Expert -** All walls are removed.

If you fall off the track, you are teleported to the start line.
